event.title: anti fatigue mats
event.description: this event is to discuss about anti fatigue mats, now everyone knows the benefit of anti fatigue mats and its uses is increases, it helps to reduce fatigue caused by lengthy standing on hard surface.so now people uses it in working conditions, kitchens, and for animal house flooring also. anti fatigue mats manufacturers now uses rubber for manufacturing mats. in this event we are trying to introduce its merits and demerits.so that people will be aware about this.
